user.title: ChoreControl Setup
user.description: Set up ChoreControl integration to connect to your ChoreControl add-on.

data_description.addon_url: URL to the ChoreControl add-on. Use http://localhost:PORT where PORT matches your add-on configuration (default: 8099)
data_description.api_token: API token from the ChoreControl add-on Settings page
data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the add-on for updates (10-300 seconds)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the ChoreControl add-on. Please check the URL and ensure the add-on is running.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid API token. Please check the token from the ChoreControl add-on Settings page.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs.
